overview: Geene Alhady is general manager of Meridian Systems, a Trimble Company (Nasdaq: TRMB) where he manages the overall Meridian business . Based out of Meridianâ€™s corporate office in Folsom, CA, Alhady leads the executive management team that oversees the product strategy, marketing and sales, customer service and support, and finance and operations functions. Alhady originally joined Meridian in 1998, and during his tenure has held various sales management roles, and was previously Vice President of Sales. Alhady began his career as a Project Manager with McCarthy Building Companies where he managed large construction projects in the healthcare and high technology industries. Alhady holds a Bachelor of Science degree in Construction Management from California State University Chico.
